PreferenceScreen.android:title: SMS Settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Utilize SMS messaging to notify you of changes in the readings

com.nightscout.android.settings.CustomSw.android:title: Enable SMS Reply
com.nightscout.android.settings.CustomSw.android:summary: The app will reply to SMS messages containing a specified keyword

com.nightscout.android.settings.CustomSw.android:title: Enable SMS Messaging
com.nightscout.android.settings.CustomSw.android:summaryOn: The app will send SMS messages with data point updates
com.nightscout.android.settings.CustomSw.android:summaryOff: The app won't send SMS messages with data point updates

EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: One or more recipients separated by commas. e.g., 12123456789,12129998877

EditTextPreference.android:title: Out of range SMS Interval
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Set the interval at which an SMS should be sent when a data point is out of range

EditTextPreference.android:title: Within Range SMS Interval
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Set the interval at which an SMS should be sent when a data point is within range

EditTextPreference.android:title: No Data SMS Interval
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Set the interval at which an SMS should be sent when not data is received
